Class AsyncTask_ImRec

      eu.liveandgov.ar.utilities.AsyncTask_ImRec

public class AsyncTask_ImRec
extends AsyncTask<String,String,HttpResponse>

Perform image recognition using the IBS* method developed by CERTH

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).

Constructor Detail

AsyncTask_ImRec

public AsyncTask_ImRec(String filepath_in,
                       String app_id_in,
                       Context ctx_in)
Asynchronously call image recognition service.

Parameters:
filepath_in - : the image to recognize temporarily stored in sd.
app_id_in - : the application framework. See at http://augreal.mklab.iti.gr/doc/doc_Recognizer.html for current options.
ctx_in - : The context to use.
